promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic swan water-type pokemon with cyan glittering feathers. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glitswanee, a a chibi cute basic swan water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Frost Wall. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "water" or "Glitswanee". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, swan-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Brandishing an icy façade, this sparkling entity dances through sea kingdoms. Known for crafting frost barriers, it's cherished by its ocean companions.
